Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.graph

Interface BlockGraphController

All Superinterfaces:
NodeView
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleBlockGraphController
public interface BlockGraphController extends NodeView
Holds and manages all block graphs for a given world.

    • updateNodes

    • updateNodes

      void updateNodes(@NotNull @NotNull Iterable<net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos> poses)
      Notifies the controller that a list of block-positions have been changed and may need to have their nodes and connections recalculated.
      Parameters:
      poses - the iterable of all the block-positions that might have been changed.

    • updateNodes

    • getGraph

      @Nullable @Nullable BlockGraph getGraph(long id)
      Gets the graph with the given ID.

      Note: this may involve loading the graph from the filesystem.

    • getGraphsInChunkSection

      @NotNull @NotNull LongStream getGraphsInChunkSection(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.math.ChunkSectionPos pos)
      Gets all graph ids in the given chunk section.

      Note: Not all graph-ids returned here are guaranteed to belong to valid graphs. getGraph(long) may return null.

      Specified by:
      getGraphsInChunkSection in interface NodeView
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the chunk section to get the graphs in.
      Returns:
      a stream of all graph ids in the given chunk section.

    • getGraphsInChunk

      @NotNull @NotNull LongStream getGraphsInChunk(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.math.ChunkPos pos)

      Note: Not all graph-ids returned here are guaranteed to belong to valid graphs. getGraph(long) may return null.

      Specified by:

    • getGraphs

      @NotNull @NotNull LongStream getGraphs()
      Gets all graph ids in this graph controller.

      Note: Not all graph-ids returned here are guaranteed to belong to valid graphs. getGraph(long) may return null.

      Specified by:
      getGraphs in interface NodeView
      Returns:
      a stream of all graph ids in this graph controller.

    • removeEmptyGraphs

      int removeEmptyGraphs()
      Called by the /graphlib removeemptygraphs command.

      Removes all empty graphs. Graphs should never be empty, but it could theoretically happen if the server crashes and some things didn't get saved.

      Returns:
      the number of empty graphs removed.
